name: HeadlessD
description:
HeadlessD is hand-painted dungeon crawler with intuitive touch controls and NO in-app purchases.
Explore randomly generated dungeon with secret traps and great treasures. Collect gold, chests, potions, fight hordes of monsters and loot the heads! Each head gives you an unique skill as well as some weakness. Find the perfect head for your liking!
This game is done by an artist who likes to play beautiful board games with simple core game mechanics like the games you used to play as a kid. Follow @GuzBoroda on Twitter or visit me at www.guzboroda.com
